items.sentence: Please listen carefully to what I have to say.
Please send me a letter as soon as you arrive.
Tom said he thought I looked like I was bored.
Tom told me that he was married to a Canadian.
Tom was on the balcony, looking at the sunset.
Tom was released from jail early this morning.
You look tired, so you should go to bed early.
You should choose your friends very carefully.
Metals can become brittle at low temperatures.
I\'d like to ask Tom to answer some questions.
